entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
